Career Profile

I’m a research engineer at Samsung Electronics. I majored in VLSI/CAD algorithms, especially focusing on the circuit physical design such as placement or routing. I got M.Sc and B.Sc degree from UNIST, Ulsan. My advisor professor is Seokhyeong Kang at POSTECH, Pohang. I use C++ for write a program. I’m interested in physical design optimization and circuit design.
